ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Fundamental physical constants (Quantity, Value, Uncertainty, Unit) for  SI (International System of Units) and non-SI units, plus unit conversions Based on the data from NIST (National Institute of Standards and Technology, USA)

Fundamental physical constants (Quantity, Value, Uncertainty, Unit) for  SI (International System of Units) and non-SI units, plus unit conversions Based on the data from NIST (National Institute of Standards and Technology, USA)

name: r-nistunits
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-nistunits
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/NISTunits_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/NISTunits/NISTunits_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: eaccd68db5c73d6a089ce5b323cdd51bc6a6a58ce467987158ba8c9be6a0a94e

build:
  number: 1007
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('NISTunits')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('NISTunits')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=NISTunits
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: Fundamental physical constants (Quantity, Value, Uncertainty, Unit) for  SI (International
    System of Units) and non-SI units, plus unit conversions Based on the data from
    NIST (National Institute of Standards and Technology, USA)
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - npavlovikj
